column5: Any W.C. members ever been or know anything about the walleye fishing on Weikwabinonaw lake ? It is located about 70-80 miles west of Thunder Bay and only has one resort on the lake called Amberlite Wilderness Resort. Resort has a website www.amberlite.ca Any information would be much appreciated.
You'll catch walleye, small mouth and northerns in there, but there are much better places to fish in terms of number and quality. Not sure exactly what you''re expectations are
